#---------------------------------- File paths ----------------------------------

main_dir         /mnt/astrophysics/kconger/                               #mounted dir for input/output images
path_to_scripts  /mnt/astrophysics/kconger/github/wisesize/mucho-galfit/  #draco path for galfit code
path_to_images   mg_output_wisesize/                                      #output path to image directories for each galaxy
data_root_dir    /mnt/astrophysics/lsdr9-wisesize                         #where JM images are stored (RA directories)

main_catalog     //.fits                                                  #full path (including filename) to main catalog
phot_catalog     //.fits                                                  #full path (including filename) to phot catalog

objid_col                                                                 #name of the objid column in the above catalogs
primary_group_col                                                         #name of primary group flag column
group_mult_col                                                            #name of group mult column (num galaxies in group?)
group_name_col                                                            #name of group name column
objname_col                                                               #name of objname column
